summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account from February 1 to February 28, 2019. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant transactions such as a $1,000,000 transfer and a $500,000 outgoing money transfer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A significant funds transfer of $1,000,000 was made into Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $500,000 was made to Bank of America.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's Deutsche Bank account for February 2019.
The beginning balance on February 1, 2019, was $249,347.94.
A total of $1,000,000 was deposited into the account on February 20, 2019.
An outgoing transfer of $500,000 was made to Bank of America on February 20, 2019.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
